items.content_html: 🔔 Alerto: A lightweight and customizable JavaScript library for displaying alert notifications on your website. With options for predefined or fully custom styles, Alerto offers seamless integration and flexibility for creating beautiful and responsive alerts. Supports different states, animations, durations, and positions.
items.title: SimonCodess/Alerto: 🔔 Alerto: A lightweight and customizable JavaScript library for displaying alert notifications on your website. With options for predefined or fully custom styles, Alerto offers seamless integration and flexibility for creating beautiful and responsive alerts. Supports different states, animations, durations, and positions.

items.content_html: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.
items.title: DuckySoLucky/hypixel-discord-chat-bridge: A two-way chat bridge between Hypixel guild chat and a Discord channel. The application utilizes discord.js v14 for communicating with Discord, and mineflayer for communicating with Hypixel.

items.content_html: qryn is a polyglot, lightweight high-performance observability stack. Ingest and analyze logs, metrics and traces from any agent compatible with Loki, Prometheus, OTLP, Tempo, Elastic, InfluxDB, Opentelemetry and more! Grafana Cloud, Splunk, Datadog alternative
